# allowsFocus

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the collection view allows its cells to become focused.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsFocus: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you implement [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewDelegate/collectionView(_:canFocusItemAt:)], its return value takes precedence over the value of this property.

The system determines the default value of this property according to the platform and other properties of the collection view.

## Working with focus

- **allowsFocusDuringEditing**: A Boolean value that determines whether the collection view allows its cells to become focused in edit mode.
- **selectionFollowsFocus**: A Boolean value that triggers an automatic selection when focus moves to a cell.
- **remembersLastFocusedIndexPath**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection view automatically assigns the focus to the item at the last focused index path.
